oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Itḥāf al-dhakī bi-sharḥ al-Tuḥfah al-mursalah ilá al-Nabī : manuscript, [ca. 1670]
Itḥāf al-zakī bi-sharḥ al-Tuḥfah al-mursalah ilá al-Nabī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan , 1616 or 1617-approximately 1690
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red. Notes in the margins.
Cream laid paper with watermark. 20.5 x 14.1 cm. (16.8 x 10 cm.).
In a blind-stamped brown leather binding with flap. Leaves are loose and not attached to the binding, which is not original.
MS Arab 250. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
